name: The alternative path to your Arizona teaching certificate
content: Join Dean Kristy Pruitt to explore an alternative path to your Arizona teaching certification and learn why Alliant International University is the teaching certification specialist. We help students turn their Bachelor's degree into a career in teaching in as few as 12 months with online programs, small class sizes, and classroom simulations. Dean Pruitt will answer your questions about the path to a career in teaching, including how to find an internship, admission and clinical practice requirements, and details about our new IMPACT Arizona scholarship which puts your new career within reach. All teaching programs are approved by the Arizona State Board of Education, accredited by the WASC Senior College and University Commission (WSCUC), and can put you on the fast-track to your teaching certificate and Master of Arts in Education (MAE) in Teaching. URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/704103-2?pid=4868 Price: General Admission: USD 0.0 Time: 17:30 - 18:30
